widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: Short Videos (Legal Content).
config.description: We have recently produced and uploaded a new short video discussing Human Trafficking under Mexican Law on our Justia YouTube Channel.

config.title: Justia Mexico Portal Content Updates.
config.description: We have recently updated the content of the Federal Civil Code, adding to the growing collection of updated laws on our portal.

config.title: Justia Daily Opinion Summaries.
config.description: We have transitioned to AI-assisted generation for Justia Daily Opinion Summaries, signifying a significant process optimization. This allows us to cover all courts moving forward, ensuring comprehensive coverage for the benefit of our users.

config.title: Justia Connect.
config.description: We remain dedicated to improving CLE offerings! We have expanded support for South Carolina and Texas CLE Courses & Credits. Additionally, Justia Connect users can easily add upcoming webinars to their calendars, along with other helpful updates.

config.title: Justia Elevate.
config.description: We have introduced several features for our Justia Elevate clients, including support for external blog feeds and updates to stripes, blocks, and site settings. Furthermore, a recent backend optimization will enhance overall performance as we integrate more sites into the system.

config.title: QA Automation.
config.description: We have launched the initial version of automated QA for both Justia Legal Dictionary and our Helpdesk system. Additionally, we've introduced visual regression support for Justia Legal Dictionary, our Justia Company portal, and Justia Business Contracts. Finally, we have implemented other behind-the-scenes features to enhance our web performance and security issues coverage.

config.title: IT Team.
config.description: This month, we performed multiple server maintenance tasks, aligning with required updates from AWS and making infrastructure adjustments to optimize costs.

config.title: Data.
config.description: We compiled and presented a report on the conversion performance of Justia Connect Pro and Justia Lawyer Directory profiles, providing valuable insights compared to our premium placement users.

config.title: Justia Lawyer Directory.
config.description: We have implemented a notification for premium placement users at the 10-month mark to share highlights of their performance in our Justia Lawyer Directory.
